text: Zorro’s Fighting Legion is a 1939 American western movie. It is about Zorro’s alter ego fighting a villain. The real person Benito Juarez is a character in the movie, but just a minor one (not very important). It was directed by William Witney and John English. ==Other websites== * * *Stomp Tokyo Review of Zorro's Fighting Legion Category:1939 movies Category:1930s epic movies Category:1930s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by William Witney Category:Movies directed by John English
title: Zorro's Fighting Legion
